name: Deeds (Deeds@CGL)
description:
Suffragettes Movement

The game is set in the historic events of the Suffragette movement in

London in 1910.

The player explores the city streets and has to recruit people to join
in a protest crowd. Some people will supply the player with certain
resources. The resources represent the Suffragettes tools used in the
early 20th century to create awareness for their fight for women’s
rights.

Objective

The goal is to get into the parliament; Police force is blocking the way
as well as roaming the streets. The police will arrest any followers
they can lay their hands on. The player must be smart about where and when to
use the given resources. Eventually, he/she will be able to break
through the final barricades and win the game.
